Name: BgmVolumeFadeArea
Notes: When the player enters this area, the music's volume will be changed. The volume resets if the player leaves the area again.

Obj_arg0.Name: Fade Time
Obj_arg0.Description: The music's fade time in frames. Default is 90.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
